H0.text: What is the family home of Cavendish's (Dukes of Devonshire). Hardwick Hall

H3.text: What is the family home of Cavendish's (Dukes of Devonshire). Chatsworth

A4.text: Chatsworth House is the seat of the Duke of Devonshire.

A5.text: The seat of the Duke of Devonshire, it has belonged to the Cavendish family since 1549.
